channel.title: How Do You Make The Login Names Capitals? Please Help
channel.description: Ok so when you are playing your server and somebody logs in for example lets say Lord Zero when that player logs into my server (project 16 v4.5) it comes up with lord_zero has logged in how do i make it so that the text files in the character folder are saved as capitals for example when you create a character it saves it in the character folder as lord_zero i want it to save as Lord Zero so when you logg in its capitals.....i know you can do it because on project 16 v6 it is capitals please help please it would be much appreciated

item.title: How Do You Make The Login Names Capitals? Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Zero Lord Zero
item.source: How Do You Make The Login Names Capitals? Please Help

item.title: How Do You Make The Login Names Capitals? Please Help

well u can do like p.k.e.r then it will come out in caps or put underscored in between[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 05:43:15 AM[/size][hr]o w8 dw =/

Read full topic

item.title: How Do You Make The Login Names Capitals? Please Help
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Zero Lord Zero
item.description:
@Lord_Zero wrote:

yea?? can u tell me how to edit it so when you logg in the names are Caps at the start of each letter and underscore[br][size=1]Posted at: November 22, 2006, 12:16:26 AM[/size][hr]no its not in the client because i use moparscape 3.2 to play my own server (project 16 v4.5) and i also have project 16 v6 and project 16 v6 is capitals and no underscores when logging in and the text files saved in the character folder are capitals with no underscores?

Read full topic
